name: Get to the Yellow Trap Door
name_original: Get to the Yellow Trap Door
description:
Somehow you got stuck in Dracula's Castle AND GOT STABBED!?!?!, all i know is that you NEED TO GET OUT!!! if you even can, just don't lose too much Blood

Controls :

WASD = Move

left Mouse  to Click on Buttons

PS: if you get stuck Press R to Restart the "Level"

this is Blood it runs out slowly when you're not moving but when you are it drains faster, expectedly if it gets to zero you die so don't let that happen

   this is The Yellow Trap Door there are three on the map get to one befiore the vampire gets to you, oh did i forget to mention there's a vampire in here with you, you know now!

i used a Kenny art pack as a base for most of the art https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pac
